statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{6 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} - 10 \, x - 7 , -6 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x + 2 , -2 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x + 3 , -4 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x + 4 , -2 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} + x + 3\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
